QuestData.Title: Falcon Versus Hawk
QuestData.Description: Do you feel the closeness, $n? Surely you feel a true bond forming between you and your falcon. Would you believe me if I told you that when the time is right you'll be able to see through the eyes of your bird? Aye, it is the ultimate level of falconry.$B$BBut first you must hunt more! The bird must hone and quicken its reflexes. Send it against a more formidable opponent! The fjord hawks of the region make the tops of the trees around us their homes. They shall be your next target!
QuestData.LogDescription: Hidalgo at the Explorers' League Outpost in the Howling Fjord wants you to use your Trained Rock Falcon to capture 10 Fjord Hawks.$B$BReturn to Hidalgo with the cage when you have completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Your falcon must be constantly fed or else it will eat the prey you are sending it to kill.
QuestData.RewardText: Aye, the hawks are very territorial and often travel in packs. I suppose I could have told you that before I sent you out into the field.
